snippet: Ryan Malone tied the score late in regulation and got the deciding goal in the ninth round of a shootout as the host Rangers beat the Chicago Blackhawks, 3-2, in a preseason game.
abstract: New York Rangers beat Chicago Blackhawks, 3-2, in NHL preseason game; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: Ryan Malone tied the score late in regulation and got the deciding goal in the ninth round of a shootout as the host Rangers beat the Chicago Blackhawks, 3-2, in a preseason game.
